DOC.brief_summary: DPN disorder among darkly pigment patient , manifest small , benign , variant seborrheic keratoses , predominantly face . The purpose study determine efficacy 585 nm PDL treatment Dermatosis Papulosa Nigra , compare therapy curettage ( scrap lesion ) electrodesiccation ( burn lesion ) .
DOC.criteria: Over 18 year age . Able give inform consent . Desires removal lesion . Willing come back six week followup . Willing fill post operative questionnaire . At least 4 lesion less 7 mm . Diagnosis Dermatosis Papulosa Nigra ( DPN ) Less 18 year age . Pregnant . Sensitive laser energy . History Collagen Vascular Disorders . History Keloids . History post inflammatory hyperpigmentation . Incarcerated . Unable give inform consent . Unable follow post operative evaluation . Unable complete patient visual analogue scale . Unable understand consent process risk . Unable accept risk scar , infection , minor bleeding , permanent prolonged hyperpigmentation hypopigmentation .
